ul: Prepare System Configuration Standards Using Industry Standards
li: Prepare System Configuration Standards Using Industry Standards
p: The system administrators and/or security managers should know the common security settings for network devices.
The staff members responsible for network security should know the technology they are working with to be able to make meaningful changes to the network and to respond to events.

Interview the staff members responsible for system administration and/or network security to make sure they know the common security settings of the system configuration standards. It may be helpful to have copies of the system configuration standards on
 hand when conducting the interviews.
Instruct the system administrators and/or security managers to study the company system configuration standards and TeamMentor materials.
Prepare System Configuration Standards Using Industry Standards
a: Prepare System Configuration Standards Using Industry Standards

links.text: Prepare System Configuration Standards Using Industry Standards

html:
Applies to

  • PCI DSS Requirement 2.2.3.a

What to Check For

The system administrators and/or security managers should know the common security settings for network devices.

Why

The staff members responsible for network security should know the technology they are working with to be able to make meaningful changes to the network and to respond to events.

How to Check

Interview the staff members responsible for system administration and/or network security to make sure they know the common security settings of the system configuration standards. It may be helpful to have copies of the system configuration standards on hand when conducting the interviews.

How to Fix

Instruct the system administrators and/or security managers to study the company system configuration standards and TeamMentor materials.

Related Items

  • Prepare System Configuration Standards Using Industry Standards
